events.title: JOY UNIVERSITY HACKATHON
events.description:
We are thrilled to announce the successful completion of Phase 1, First Place of the TANSAM Hackathon Season, hosted at Joy University on April 16, 2025. Themed "Enhancing Large Vehicle Maintenance with AR/VR and IoT", the event brought together brilliant minds and cutting-edge ideas focused on transforming the future of large-scale vehicle maintenance through immersive and intelligent technologies.

The hackathon witnessed enthusiastic participation from students across various institutions, showcasing innovative solutions and technical prowess. The event was a resounding success, marked by creativity, collaboration, and technological excellence.
